long_description: The BugBand Portable Insect Repellent diffuser contains a replaceable cartridge of high-concentrate geraniol repellent and a battery-operated fan to form a protective barrier against annoying bugs. Includes three replaceable cartridges; each cartridge repels insects for up to 120 hrs. and covers an area of 200 - 300 sq. ft. Simply set the diffuser in the desired location and flip the switch on. Operates on three AA batteries (sold separately). Geraniol, a natural ingredient derived from geranium oil, produces a pleasant natural fragrance. The BugBand Portable Insect Repellent diffuser can be used indoors or outdoors.
short_description: The BugBand Portable Insect Repellent diffuser contains a replaceable cartridge of high-concentrate geraniol repellent and a battery-operated fan to form a protective barrier against annoying bugs.
